task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 34°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: Moving closer to the target building (via the available front-right move) will provide a clearer view of its full structure, helping to accurately count floors and estimate height.
Based on observing the main building's visible floors (approximately 8 stories, with each story estimated at ~3 meters), the total height is estimated to be 24 meters.
